overview: Bai Xia, a disciple of the Qishan School, was obsessed with cultivating Taoism and becoming immortal. For this reason, he did not hesitate to steal the list of enshrined gods that had been sealed for a thousand years. Legend has it that there is a vacant position for becoming immortal on the Conferred God List, and whoever writes on it will be able to become immortal. However, when Bai Xia stole the Fengshen List, it caused a bloody storm. Ban Wuyao, who has practiced for thousands of years, has taken the Fengshen List. In the process of retrieving the Fengshen List, Bai Xia met the powerful and powerful Yuchi Longyao and the lovely and clever Yahe. They joined hands to slay demons and slay demons, and staged a show. A ridiculous and thrilling story.
title: League of Gods: Enfeoffment Order
